title: Coupon Code
alt: This also guarantees he won't be one of the ones to get a bobcat.
transcript:
[The panel shows an online shopping form.]
Shipping: $14.08
Total: $80.02
If you have a coupon code, enter it here:
[An empty form.]
Check out[In a frameless panel, Cueball is looking at his computer.][The empty form is now filled in. The rest of the panel shows the same page.]
Form: In 1987, you quietly took something from the house of a dying woman. You thought nobody knew. You were wrong.[Cueball is sitting at his computer.]
Click[The form is updated.]
Shipping: $14.08
Total: $80.02
----------------
Discount
Applied: -$80.02
Final price: $0.00
Thank you
-Your order has been placed-
